Activity: Arrive at the office, log in to the computer, and check emails. Review any overnight communications.
Meet with @itpm-1 to discuss the integration of the data quality issue reporting process with the current IT service management system.
Based on the meeting with @itpm-1, revise the data quality issue reporting process to align with the capabilities of the existing system.
Develop a training plan for staff on how to use the new data quality issue reporting process and template. This will be passed to the training coordinator.
Draft an email to @trainer-1 with the training plan. @PEOPLE Data Quality Training Plan.
Lunch break. Read a healthcare IT trade publication.
Continue to review the documentation from the data quality issues. Start to format the documentation so it is easily readable.

Meet with @clinlead-1 to get buy-in on the data quality issue reporting process and template. Discuss the importance of accurate data for clinical decision-making and reporting of influenza trends. @PEOPLE Clinician Feedback on Reporting.
Incorporate feedback from @clinlead-1 into the data quality issue reporting process and template.
Finalize the data quality issue reporting process and template. Create a final version for distribution.
Respond to any outstanding emails and complete administrative tasks.
